Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.newToBeRepaidTokenAmount: New to be repaid token amount

getIngotsAmountIn(uint256).details: Used to determine how much tokens will be received by provided ingots amount

getTokensAmountOut(uint256).details: Used to determine how much tokens will be received by provided ingots amount

init(address).details: Called by address which created current instance

investIntoPrizePool(uint256).details: Bless tokens must be sent to this function (if its type=eth) or will be deducted from msg.sender (if its type=erc20)

swapIngotsForTokens(address,uint256,uint.details: If resourcesOwner == address(0) -> resources will be taken from msg.senderIf resourcesOwner != address(0) and resourcesOwner has given allowance to msg.sender >= ingotsAmount -> resources will be taken from resourcesOwner

params.minTokensToReceive: Minimum amount of tokens to receive

withdrawRepayment().details: Triggers withdraw of potential added balance

lastSyncedTokenBalance.details: Updated when #investIntoPrizePool or #swapIngotsForTokens or #withdrawRepayment are called

NoTokensWillBeReceived().notice: Thrown when attempting to swap ingots for tokens but specified ingots amount are not enough even for one unit of token

NotEnoughTokensLeft().notice: Thrown when attempting to swap ingots for tokens but not enough tokens left for specified ingots amount

OnlyActiveGame().notice: Thrown when attempting to call action which can only be called in active game (started and not finished)

ReentrantCall().notice: Thrown when attempting to call function via reentrancy

TokensToBeReceivedLessThanMinimumRequire.notice: Thrown when attempting to swap ingots for tokens but amount of tokens to be received less than specified minimum amount

UnableToReceiveEther().notice: Thrown when attempting to receive ether while having non native token reward

defaultTokenPrice().notice: Represents how much of ingots must be given for one unit of token by default (in 64.64 format)

getCurrentPrice().notice: Calculates current price of token in ingots

getIngotsAmountIn(uint256).notice: Calculates minimum amount of ingots required for specified amount of tokens to receive

getTokensAmountOut(uint256).notice: Calculates amount of tokens to be received by provided ingots amount

investIntoPrizePool(uint256).notice: Invests specified amount of tokens into prize pool

lastSyncedTokenBalance().notice: Represents last synced reward pool total balance after repayment and function(s) are done

toBeRepaidTokenAmount().notice: Represents how much bless tokens must be repaid first to the mighty creator

withdrawRepayment().notice: Withdraws potential bless token added balance to the mighty creator
